snippet.title: Good morning, let's preview the NBA playoffs
snippet.description:
Good morning, let's preview the NBA playoffs by Tom Ziller on Apr 18 2014, 7:55a
Playoff basketball is one day away.

snippet.title: Good morning, let's talk about the NBA playoffs
snippet.description:
Good morning, let's talk about the NBA playoffs by Tom Ziller on Apr 17 2014, 7:58a
The seeds are set, the schedule's out and the playoffs are (almost) here.

snippet.title: The Hook's 2014 NBA Awards: Knicks failure, Gregg Popovich quotes, worst contracts and more
snippet.description:
The Hook's 2014 NBA Awards: Knicks failure, Gregg Popovich quotes, worst contracts and more by Tom Ziller on Apr 15 2014, 10:26a
Let us guide you back through the 2013-14 NBA regular season with a look at the superlatives in selected categories.

snippet.title: Los Angeles Lakers hoping for mutual split with Mike D'Antoni, per report
snippet.description:
Los Angeles Lakers hoping for mutual split with Mike D'Antoni, per report by Satchel Price on Apr 12 2014, 6:05p
The Lakers want a new coach, but would prefer not to fire their current one.

snippet.title: History, flexibility make Lakers' future brighter than it appears
snippet.description:
History, flexibility make Lakers' future brighter than it appears by Mark Deeks on Apr 11 2014, 2:36p
Even with a bare roster, the Lakers' cap room and market position put them in good position to retool faster than most teams.

snippet.title: Lakers extend Mitch Kupchak's deal, Mike D'Antoni's future uncertain
snippet.description:
Lakers extend Mitch Kupchak's deal, Mike D'Antoni's future uncertain by Jason Patt on Apr 9 2014, 9:40a
The Lakers have faith in Kupchak to help turn things around, and one of the first order's of business will be to make a decision on D'Antoni.

snippet.title: Overcoming tougher NBA playoff defense wins championships
snippet.description:
Overcoming tougher NBA playoff defense wins championships by Tom Ziller on Apr 4 2014, 10:27a
The cliché is that defense wins championships. It's a little more complicated than that.

snippet.title: Good morning, Steph Curry is all out of bubblegum
snippet.description:
Good morning, Steph Curry is all out of bubblegum by Tom Ziller on Apr 2 2014, 8:06a
Curry hits an insane shot to beat the Mavericks, and a whole lot more.

snippet.title: NBA news roundup: Andrew Wiggins officially going to NBA, Lakers plan to keep Nash
snippet.description:
NBA news roundup: Andrew Wiggins officially going to NBA, Lakers plan to keep Nash by James Herbert on Mar 31 2014, 4:51p
In unsurprising news, Andrew Wiggins will enter the draft. In perhaps surprising news, Steve Nash will likely remain a Laker next season.

snippet.title: Doc's L.A. Story: Trading a winter of discontent for West Coast revival
snippet.description:
Doc's L.A. Story: Trading a winter of discontent for West Coast revival by Paul Flannery on Apr 1 2014, 1:30p
LOS ANGELES — The day before I left for Los Angeles was what passes for warm in Boston, which means hoodies and layers instead of puffy coats and down. The snow mounds had melted down to their...
